EmailTemplate.subject: BAP Benefits Comprehensive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
legalzoom.com
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email.
The LegalZoom Business Advantage Pro gives you access to the following benefits:
Attorney advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced attorney on an unlimited number of new legal matters Tax Professional advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced Tax Professional on an unlimited number of new tax issues Attorney drafted letters. Your attorney can draft legal letters or on your behalf Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms. Download hundreds of blank legal forms for business or personal use 1 Free copyright per month, all you pay is the Federal filing fee Access to CreditAlert Plus from Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp. Establish & monitor your Business Credit Profile. 25% savings on additional attorney services. Get significant savings on additional attorney work if you need it 20% savings on any additional tax services 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents. Get any LegalZoom business or personal documents at a discount
After your 30-day trial, your Business Advantage Pro membership renews automatically at $__.__ per month. You can always choose to enroll with a 6 or 12 month membership. A 6 month renewal is $161.94 (equal to $26.99 a month), and a 12 month renewal is $287.88 (equal to $23.99 a month).

Call Customer Care: (800) 773-0888 LegalZoom. Legal help for the modern world.
Privacy Policy
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
